txt.en: If you would like to skip the remainder of the tutorial experience and be transported to Thorin's Gate at the outset of the game's story, speak with Glóin again.

If you choose to skip the tutorial experience, you will be transported to Thorin's Gate at the height of the Dourhand's control over Thorin's Hall and will be unable to travel to Thorin's Gate prior to those events.\n\nAre you sure you want to continue?
Allows players to skip through to the public area of the game.
Talk to Glóin to skip the Tutorial
If you would like to skip the remainder of the tutorial experience and be transported to Thorin's Gate at the outset of the game's story, speak with Glóin again.
